Clue Page
Welcome to the Treasure Hunt Game

Game Rules:
 1. One clue leads to another and eventually the treasure is found.
 2. Click "Hint" to see a clue. Only one clue is presented at a time, and location services (gps) are used to tell if the clue is solved.
 3. When you believe you are at the location of the treasure click "Found It".
